exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a : nat -> R, ex_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n)) -> ex_series a" on hypothesis of type "is_series a l".

original: intros c a H. unfold ex_series in H. destruct H as [l H]. apply ex_series_Rabs in H. apply ex_series_scal_r in H. exists (l * c). apply H.
